input.sentences: we went to my aunt martha 's birthday celebration .
my uncle sean was there as well .
her friends jonna and [female] were there to greet us with smiles .
2 of my aunts and my uncle were very good hosts .
my 2nd cousin john had his wife there as well .
output.sentences: Martha is happy to celebrate her birthday with the family.
Uncle Sean is so proud of her.
It's all smiles as Jonna greets Martha.
This uncle hosts with all the aunts.
Finally we get to meet cousin John's wife!
